docs.title: Welcome to Ecoli MkDocs
docs.text: This is a website from Ecoli, which is deployed on Github Pages.

docs.title: MkDocs Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [Ecoli] - 新建一个名字为Ecoli的页面
  • mkdocs serve - 开启自带服务器实时预览【bug】.
  • mkdocs build - 构建网页端.
  • mkdocs -h - 打印帮助文档.

docs.title: Git Commands
docs.text:
• git init - 初始化git.
  • git add . - 将所有文件提交缓冲区.
  • git commit -m "example" - 编写提交备注.
  • git push origin main - 将文件提交至仓库main分支.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Welcome to the website built by Ecoli.
